text: Abraham Joshua Twerski (; ) was an American Hasidic rabbi. He was a psychiatrist focusing in substance abuse. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Rabbi Twerski died in Jerusalem on January 31, 2021 of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Israel, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jerusalem Category:American rabbis Category:Israeli rabbis Category:American psychiatrists Category:Israeli scientists Category:Scientists from Milwaukee
title: Abraham J. Twerski
